form.helpvalue:
Check the documentation for setting up a web app or a native app property.
If you use both a web app and a native app, you will need to do the following:
  • Create a new property (website or app), or use an existing property,
  • Select the property in the admin menu,
  • Click on the + New Profile button,
  • Select Web Site or App, depending on what your property is missing.
